help_dict.alphabet: Name of the Alphabet to generate embeddings
help_dict.augment: Whether to use data augmentation for train data
help_dict.batch_size: # of images in each batch of data
help_dict.best: Load best model or most recent for testing
help_dict.ckpt_dir: Directory in which to save model checkpoints
help_dict.data_dir: Directory in which data is stored
help_dict.flush: Whether to delete ckpt + log files for model no.
help_dict.get_embedding: Whether to evaluate accuracy or get image embeddings
help_dict.is_train: Whether to train or test the model
help_dict.logs_dir: Directory in which logs wil be stored
help_dict.lr_patience: Number of epochs to wait before reducing lr
help_dict.n_embeddings: number of images to generate embeddings from
help_dict.num_model: Model number used for unique checkpointing
help_dict.num_workers: # of subprocesses to use for data loading
help_dict.resume: Whether to resume training from checkpoint
help_dict.shuffle: Whether to shuffle the dataset between epochs
help_dict.train_patience: Number of epochs to wait before stopping train
help_dict.use_gpu: Whether to run on the GPU
